docs.snippet: Academy Awards after parties are always swanky and star-studded. But this year, even disparate celebrations had a conversation topic in common: The best-picture gaffe that saw Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway award the night's top prize to "La La La...
docs.lead_paragraph: Academy Awards after parties are always swanky and star-studded. But this year, even disparate celebrations had a conversation topic in common: The best-picture gaffe that saw Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway award the night's top prize to "La La Land," only to correct themselves and present it to "Moonlight." The unprecedented error dominated post-party talk.

headline.main: Oscars Best Picture Gaffe Dominates After-Party Chatter
headline.print_headline: Oscars Best Picture Gaffe Dominates After-Party Chatter

docs.snippet: “I’m holding the envelope and the award, and I had just given my speech, and there are people on the stage with headsets, and I thought, ‘That doesn’t seem right.’”...
docs.lead_paragraph: “I’m holding the envelope and the award, and I had just given my speech, and there are people on the stage with headsets, and I thought, ‘That doesn’t seem right.’”

headline.main: What It Was Like Onstage During the Oscars 2017 Best Picture Mistake
headline.print_headline: From ‘The Envelope, Please’  to ‘Whoops!’ on Oscars Show

byline.original: By BROOKS BARNES and CARA BUCKLEY

docs.snippet: A young volunteer in the Syrian search-and-rescue group featured in an Academy Award-winning documentary said Monday he hopes the award will help stop "massacres" in his country, and described a U.S. decision to block him from traveling to Los Ang...
docs.lead_paragraph: A young volunteer in the Syrian search-and-rescue group featured in an Academy Award-winning documentary said Monday he hopes the award will help stop "massacres" in his country, and described a U.S. decision to block him from traveling to Los Angeles for the Oscars as "America's loss."

headline.main: Oscar-Winning Syrian Group Hopes Award Will Stop 'Massacres'
headline.print_headline: Oscar-Winning Syrian Group Hopes Award Will Stop 'Massacres'

docs.snippet: Let's hope they all just went out and had a stiff drink together and laughed about it....
docs.lead_paragraph: Let's hope they all just went out and had a stiff drink together and laughed about it.

headline.main: A Snafu for the Ages Tops Oscar's Notable Moments
headline.print_headline: A Snafu for the Ages Tops Oscar's Notable Moments

docs.snippet: Donald Trump's name was rarely mentioned during Sunday's Academy Awards, but the U.S. president's policies were a running subtext throughout the evening....
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump's name was rarely mentioned during Sunday's Academy Awards, but the U.S. president's policies were a running subtext throughout the evening.

headline.main: Trump Policies Play Supporting Role in 2017 Oscars
headline.print_headline: Trump Policies Play Supporting Role in 2017 Oscars

docs.snippet: Mr. Miranda, nominated in the best original song category for “How Far I’ll Go” from “Moana,” had the chance to fill in his missing Oscar....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Miranda, nominated in the best original song category for “How Far I’ll Go” from “Moana,” had the chance to fill in his missing Oscar.

docs.snippet: It is the nightmare scenario of every awards show: “Moonlight” won the Oscar for best picture, but not before “La La Land” was mistakenly announced as the winner....
docs.lead_paragraph: It is the nightmare scenario of every awards show: “Moonlight” won the Oscar for best picture, but not before “La La Land” was mistakenly announced as the winner.

docs.snippet: It was one of the most awkward moments in the history of the Oscars, of television, in entertainment, heck maybe in American history....
docs.lead_paragraph: It was one of the most awkward moments in the history of the Oscars, of television, in entertainment, heck maybe in American history.

headline.main: Oops, Our Bad: 'Moonlight' Really Won in Major Mess-Up
headline.print_headline: Oops, Our Bad: 'Moonlight' Really Won in Major Mess-Up

docs.snippet: The Oscar for Asghar Farhadi's "The Salesman" energized many of the filmmaker's fellow Iranians, who saw the win for best foreign film Monday as a pointed rebuke to the Trump administration and its efforts to deny them entry into the U.S....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Oscar for Asghar Farhadi's "The Salesman" energized many of the filmmaker's fellow Iranians, who saw the win for best foreign film Monday as a pointed rebuke to the Trump administration and its efforts to deny them entry into the U.S.

headline.main: Iranians Cheer Farhadi's Oscar as Rebuke of Trump Policies
headline.print_headline: Iranians Cheer Farhadi's Oscar as Rebuke of Trump Policies

docs.snippet: If it were in the screenplay of a Hollywood drama — or maybe farce — directors would surely reject it. But let's set the scene anyway for the Academy Awards drama over what film did, and didn't, win the Oscar for best picture on Sunday...
docs.lead_paragraph: If it were in the screenplay of a Hollywood drama — or maybe farce — directors would surely reject it. But let's set the scene anyway for the Academy Awards drama over what film did, and didn't, win the Oscar for best picture on Sunday night.

headline.main: Here's What Happened Onstage During the Oscars' Mistake
